Name: Swallowed Penny
Description: Upon taking damage, Isaac drops a coin.

Name: Petrified Poop
Description: Greatly increases the chances of a pickup dropping when destroying poop.

Name: AAA Battery
Description: Automatically recharges the last energy slot of an activated item, effectively reducing recharge rates by one.

Name: Broken Remote
Description: Triggers the  Teleport! effect whenever an activated item is used.

Name: Purple Heart
Description: Increases the chance of encountering champion enemies and bosses.

Name: Broken Magnet
Description: Pulls coins towards Isaac, but ignores other pickups.

Name: Rosary Bead
Description: Increases the chance of Angel Rooms appearing, as well as the chance to find The Bible in the Library and Shop.

Name: Cartridge
Description: Chance to trigger  The Gamekid effect upon taking damage.

Name: Pulse Worm
Description: Tears pulsate in size as they travel.

Name: Wiggle Worm
Description: Isaac's tears travel in a wave-like pattern. +0.4 Tears up.  Also grants spectral tears.

Name: Ring Worm
Description: Isaac fires in a fast spiraling pattern.  Also grants spectral tears.

Name: Flat Worm
Description: Isaac's tears take on an oblong appearance. They also push enemies back.

Name: Store Credit
Description: The next  Shop purchase is free. The trinket disappears after purchasing anything there.

Name: Callus
Description: Prevents damage from creep and spikes.

Name: Lucky Rock
Description: Rocks and their variants drop 1 penny when destroyed.

Name: Mom's Toenail
Description: Once a minute, Mom's foot randomly stomps down somewhere in the room.

Name: Black Lipstick
Description: Increases the chance of Black Hearts appearing.

Name: Bible Tract
Description: Increases the chance of Eternal Hearts appearing.

Name: Paper Clip
Description: Golden Chests can be opened without using a Key.

Name: Monkey Paw
Description: If the character has half a heart after taking damage, it drops a black heart. The effect can trigger up to three times, after which the trinket will disappear.

Name: Mysterious Paper
Description: Has a chance to replicate the effects of  A Missing Page,  The Polaroid,  The Negative, or  Missing Poster.

Name: Daemon's Tail
Description: Most non-specific heart drops become Black Hearts, but heart drops are significantly less common.

Name: Missing Poster
Description: Dying in Sacrifice Room while holding it unlocks The Lost. If The Lost is already unlocked, revives Isaac as The Lost if he dies anywhere, then disappears.

Name: Butt Penny
Description: Isaac will fart when he picks up a coin. Coins have a higher chance to drop from poops.

Name: Mysterious Candy
Description: Isaac farts or poops at random intervals. Getting hit can also trigger the effect.

Name: Hook Worm
Description: Tears move shifting left to right on a square-wave-like path. +10 to range (effective range remains about the same).

Name: Whip Worm
Description: Increases shot speed by 0.5,  increasing effective range.

Name: Broken Ankh
Description: When held, Isaac has a 22.22% chance to be revived as  ??? in the most recent non-hostile room. Can occur multiple times in the same run.

Name: Fish Head
Description: Spawns a Blue Fly every time Isaac takes damage.

Name: Pinky Eye
Description: Adds a 10% chance to shoot a poison tear, dealing damage over time when inflicted.

Name: Push Pin
Description: Adds a 10% chance to shoot a piercing and spectral tear.

Name: Liberty Cap
Description: Adds a chance when entering a room to gain a random passive mushroom item for one room.

Name: Umbilical Cord
Description: When brought down to only a Half Red Heart, spawns a  Little Steven familiar for the current room.  Adds a high chance to spawn a  Gemini familiar for the current room after taking damage.

Name: Child's Heart
Subname: It calls out to its brothers
Description: Increases the chance of a heart pickup dropping after clearing a room, and the chance of finding a heart when opening a Chest.

Name: Curved Horn
Description: Increases damage by 2.

Name: Rusted Key
Description: Increases the chance of keys dropping after clearing a room, and the chance of finding keys when opening a chest.

Name: Goat Hoof
Description: +0.15 speed.

Name: Mom's Pearl
Description: Grants a secondary 10% chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a soul heart.

Name: Cancer
Description: -2 tear delay (effectively increases fire rate of tears).

Name: Red Patch
Description: Grants a chance of increasing damage by 1.8 for the current room upon taking damage.

Name: Match Stick
Description: Increases the chance of bombs dropping after clearing a room, and the chance of finding Bombs when opening a Chest.

Name: Lucky Toe
Description: +1 Luck. Adds a chance to drop an extra pickup when opening a chest, destroying a machine, or blowing up a tinted rock.

Name: Cursed Skull
Description: If Isaac has less than one full Red Heart after taking damage, he will be immediately teleported to the last cleared room he was in.

Name: Safety Cap
Description: Improves the chance of pills dropping after clearing a room, and the chance of finding a pill when opening a chest.

Name: Ace of Spades
Description: Increases the chance of tarot cards or playing cards dropping after clearing a room, and the chance of finding cards when opening a chest.

Name: Isaac's Fork
Description: Isaac has a chance to heal for 1/2 a Red Heart upon clearing a room.

Name: A Missing Page
Description: 5% chance to induce  The Necronomicon's effect upon taking damage.  Adds +40 damage to Black Hearts and The Necromonicon-like effects.

Name: Bloody Penny
Description: Gives a chance to drop a Half Red Heart when a coin is collected.

Name: Burnt Penny
Description: Gives a chance to drop a bomb when a coin is collected.

Name: Flat Penny
Description: Gives a chance to drop a key when a coin is collected.

Name: Counterfeit Penny
Description: Gives a 50% chance of increasing the value of every coin pickup by one.

Name: Tick
Description: Drains 15% health from enemies with more than 60 HP. Restores one Red Heart when entering an uncleared boss room. The Tick cannot be dropped or swapped for another trinket (except for  Match Stick).

Name: Isaac's Head
Description: Spawns Isaac's severed head as a tear-firing familiar. Fires piercing tears.

Name: Maggy's Faith
Description: Gives an eternal heart at the start of every floor.

Name: Judas' Tongue
Description: Items in the Devil Room only cost 1 heart. Soul heart trades still cost 3 soul hearts.

Name: ???'s Soul
Description: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern similar to  The Peeper and fires spectral and homing tears.

Name: Samson's Lock
Description: 1/15 chance to increase damage by 0.5 for the current room each time an enemy dies.

Name: Cain's Eye
Description: When starting a floor, 25% chance to gain the effect of  The Compass for the duration of the floor.

Name: Eve's Bird Foot
Description: 5% chance to spawn a  Dead Bird familiar for the current room each time an enemy dies.

Name: The Left Hand
Subname: The left-hand path reaps dark rewards
Description: Replaces all types of Chests with Red Chests.

Name: Shiny Rock
Description: Tinted rocks and rocks with  Crawl Spaces underneath flash white upon entering the room and every 10 seconds afterward.

Name: Safety Scissors
Description: Troll bombs turn into Bomb pickups before they explode. Mega troll bombs turn into double bombs before they explode.

Name: Rainbow Worm
Description: Isaac's tears gain a worm effect that changes every 3 seconds.

Name: Tape Worm
Description: Doubles Isaac's range and halves his tear height.

Name: Lazy Worm
Description: Increases range by 4 and decreases shot speed by .4.

Name: Cracked Dice
Description: Activates the effect of  The D6,  D8,  D12, or  D20 (chosen randomly) whenever Isaac takes damage.

Name: Super Magnet
Description: Pulls enemies and pickups towards Isaac.

Name: Faded Polaroid
Description: Occasionally causes Isaac to blend into the ground, which briefly confuses all enemies in the room.

Name: Louse
Description: Occasionally spawns a Blue Spider.

Name: Bob's Bladder
Description: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs Isaac places, which damages enemies that walk over it.

Name: Watch Battery
Description: Increased chance of batteries spawning. Has a chance to add an extra charge to Isaac's activated item upon completing a room.

Name: Blasting Cap
Description: Exploding bombs have a chance to drop another Bomb pickup.

Name: Stud Finder
Description: Increases the chance to find a Crawl Space.

Name: Error
Description: Gives a random trinket effect each room.

Name: Poker Chip
Description: Chests have a 50% chance of paying out with extra pickups and a 50% chance of paying out with nothing or enemies.

Name: Blister
Description: Increases knockback of tears.

Name: Second Hand
Description: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies.

Name: Endless Nameless
Description: Has a 25% chance of creating a duplicate of any pill, card, or rune Isaac uses.

Name: Black Feather
Description: Increases Isaac's Damage by +0.5 for each of the following items or trinkets he possesses:

Name: Blind Rage
Description: Increases invincibility time after getting hit.

Name: Golden Horse Shoe
Description: +15% chance for  Treasure Rooms to have two items. Only one item can be taken.

Name: Store Key
Description: Shops can be opened without using Keys.

Name: Rib of Greed
Description: Prevents Greed and Super Greed from appearing in shops and secret rooms, and makes coin drops after clearing rooms more likely.

Name: Karma
Description: Donating to a donation machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a beggar. Increases the chance that donating to a Donation Machine will increase Isaac's luck.

Name: Lil Larva
Description: Spawns a Blue Fly from every pile of poop that Isaac destroys.

Name: Mom's Locket
Description: Grants half a red heart each time a key is used. Converts half red heart pickups into full red hearts.

Name: NO!
Description: Prevents active items from being generated, if possible.

Name: Child Leash
Description: Causes familiars to stay closer to each other.

Name: Brown Cap
Description: Poop explodes upon being destroyed.

Name: Meconium
Description: Black poop can drop black hearts when destroyed. Poop has a chance to turn into black poop.

Name: Cracked Crown
Description: Boosts speed, range, shot speed, tears and damage if they are above their base values.

Name: Used Diaper
Description: Grants the  Skatole effect in some rooms.

Name: Fish Tail
Description: Items and trinkets that generate Blue Flies or locusts will generate twice as many.

Name: Black Tooth
Description: Adds a chance to fire a black tooth that deals double damage and poisons enemies.

Name: Ouroboros Worm
Description: Tears travel in a large spiral pattern and become spectral, with a small chance to home.

Name: Tonsil
Description: When hit, there is a small chance a removed tonsil familiar starts following Isaac, blocking enemy shots.

Name: Nose Goblin
Description: Chance to fire a homing booger that sticks to enemies and deals damage over time.

Name: Super Ball
Description: Makes tears have a chance to bounce off enemies and obstacles.

Name: Vibrant Bulb
Description: Provides a boost to all stats when Isaac's active item is fully charged.

Name: Dim Bulb
Description: Provides a boost to all stats when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged.

Name: Fragmented Card
Description: Makes two Secret Rooms spawn on each floor.

Name: Equality!
Description: Turns pickups into their doubled versions while Isaac's numbers of coins, bombs, and keys are equal.

Name: Wish Bone
Description: Taking damage has a small chance to destroy the trinket and spawn a random item.

Name: Bag Lunch
Description: Taking damage has a small chance to destroy the trinket and spawn  Lunch.

Name: Lost Cork
Description: Increases the radius of any creep produced by Isaac.

Name: Crow Heart
Description: Red Heart damage will be taken before Soul Heart, Black Heart, and  Rotten Heart damage.

Name: Walnut
Subname: That's a hard nut to crack!
Description: Being hit by explosions will eventually destroy the trinket and spawn various pickups.

Name: Duct Tape
Description: Holds Isaac's familiars in place relative to his position.

Name: Silver Dollar
Description: Shops appear in Chapter 4.

Name: Bloody Crown
Description: Treasure Rooms appear in chapter 4.

Name: Pay to Win
Description: Restock boxes always spawn in Item Rooms.

Name: Locust of War
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies for the first time, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies.

Name: Locust of Pestilence
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Green Locust which damages and poisons enemies.

Name: Locust of Famine
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Yellow Locust that damages and slows enemies.

Name: Locust of Death
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Black Locust that does a very high amount of damage.

Name: Locust of Conquest
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns 2-5 White Locusts which damage enemies.

Name: Bat Wing
Description: Upon killing an enemy, has a chance to grant flight for the rest of the room.

Name: Stem Cell
Description: Heals Isaac's Red Heart health to 50% of maximum upon traveling to the next floor. If his health is already equal to or above 50%, it heals half a Red Heart instead.

Name: Hairpin
Description: Fully recharges Isaac's active item upon entering a boss fight.

Name: Wooden Cross
Description: Grants a shield that negates the first damage taken once per floor.

Name: Butter!
Description: Using an active item will drop it onto a pedestal on the ground. Taking damage may result in dropping a passive item.

Name: Filigree Feather
Description: Angels drop Angel Room items instead of key pieces when defeated.

Name: Door Stop
Description: The last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it.

Name: Extension Cord
Description: Bolts of electricity arc between Isaac and his familiars, damaging any enemies between them.

Name: Rotten Penny
Description: Spawns a Blue Fly every time a coin is picked up.

Name: Baby-Bender
Description: Grants Isaac's familiars homing shots.

Name: Finger Bone
Description: Grants a chance to gain a   Bone Heart upon taking damage.

Name: Jawbreaker
Description: Adds the chance to fire teeth that deal 3.2x damage; mechanically identical to the passive item  Tough Love.

Name: Chewed Pen
Description: Adds a chance to fire tears that slow enemies.

Name: Blessed Penny
Description: Gives a chance to drop a Half Soul Heart when a coin is collected.

Name: Broken Syringe
Description: Grants a chance to gain a random syringe effect for the current room.

Name: Short Fuse
Description: Bombs placed by Isaac explode quicker.

Name: Gigante Bean
Description: Increases the size of Isaac's farts.

Name: A Lighter
Description: Adds a chance for enemies to burn upon entering a room.

Name: Broken Padlock
Description: Locks can be opened with explosions.

Name: Myosotis
Description: When entering a new floor, up to four uncollected pickups from the previous floor spawn in the starting room.

Name: 'M
Description: Using an activated item rerolls it.

Name: Teardrop Charm
Description: Luck-based tear effects have a higher chance of occurring.

Name: Apple of Sodom
Description: Picking up red hearts, even while at full health, can convert them into blue spiders. The effect may consume hearts needed for healing.

Name: Forgotten Lullaby
Description: Improves the fire rate of Isaac's familiars.

Name: Beth's Faith
Description: At the beginning of each floor, spawn 4-8 wisps that orbit Isaac and fires tears alongside him.

Name: Old Capacitor
Description: Active items don't charge when clearing rooms. Adds a chance to spawn a Lil' Battery when clearing a room, independent of the room's original drop.

Name: Brain Worm
Description: Tears snap 90 degrees to target enemies that they may have missed.

Name: Perfection
Subname: Luck way up. Don't lose it!
Description: +10 Luck. If Isaac takes damage, the trinket is destroyed and its effect is removed.

Name: Devil's Crown
Description: Treasure Rooms are replaced with unique Red Treasure Rooms, offering a Deal with the Devil in place of an item.

Name: Charged Penny
Description: Picking up coins has a chance to give an Active Item charge.

Name: Friendship Necklace
Description: Causes familiars to orbit Isaac.

Name: Panic Button
Description: Activates Isaac's active item just before he takes damage.

Name: Blue Key
Description: Doors can be unlocked without using keys. Opening a door this way brings Isaac to an in-between room that resembles  ???, with a few monsters.

Name: Flat File
Description: Causes all spikes to retract, making them harmless. Also affects the doors to Curse Rooms.

Name: Telescope Lens
Description: Increases the chance for Planetariums to spawn even if one has been visited and allows Planetariums to spawn in Chapter 4.

Name: Mom's Lock
Description: Grants the effects of a random Mom item each room.

Name: Dice Bag
Description: When Isaac enters a new room, has a chance to give him a Dice item as a consumable for the current room.

Name: Holy Crown
Subname: Walk the path of the saint
Description: A Treasure Room and Shop appears in the  Cathedral.

Name: Mother's Kiss
Description: Grants one heart container.

Name: Torn Card
Description: Every 15 shots, Isaac shoots an  Ipecac +  My Reflection tear.

Name: Torn Pocket
Description: Upon taking damage, Isaac drops 2 random Pickups from among those he's currently holding.

Name: Gilded Key
Description: Replaces all new chests, except Mega Chests, with Locked Chests.

Name: Lucky Sack
Description: Spawns a Grab Bag upon traveling to the next floor.

Name: Wicked Crown
Subname: Walk the path of the wicked
Description: A Treasure Room and Shop appears in  Sheol.

Name: Azazel's Stump
Description: When clearing a room, adds a chance to turn into Azazel until clearing another.

Name: Dingle Berry
Description: Spawns a Dip Familiar upon clearing a room.

Name: Ring Cap
Description: Placing a bomb spawns an extra bomb for free.

Name: Nuh Uh!
Description: Replaces keys and coins that spawn in Chapter 4 and beyond with more useful pickups.

Name: Modeling Clay
Description: Grants the effect of a random passive Item each room.

Name: Polished Bone
Description: After clearing a room, adds a chance to spawn a friendly Bony.

Name: Hollow Heart
Description: Grants an empty bone heart upon entering a new floor.

Name: Kid's Drawing
Description: While held, counts towards the Guppy transformation.

Name: Crystal Key
Description: Whenever Isaac clears a room, has a chance to open a neighboring  Red Room.

Name: Keeper's Bargain
Description: Adds a chance for Devil Deals to cost money instead of health.

Name: Cursed Penny
Description: Picking up coins teleports Isaac to a random room.

Name: Your Soul
Description: Can be used to pay for a Devil deal without losing hearts, and is then consumed.

Name: Number Magnet
Description: Increases the chance of earning a  Devil Room by 10%, prevents Krampus from spawning, and generates special Devil Room layouts.

Name: Strange Key
Description: Unlocks the passageway to  ??? and the   Hush fight, regardless of the run duration. Using  Pandora's Box grants it a special effect, consuming the key.

Name: Lil Clot
Description: Spawns a clot familiar that mimics Isaac's movements and tears. It dies for the current room after taking too much damage.

Name: Temporary Tattoo
Description: Drops a chest after clearing a  Challenge Room, or an extra Boss item after clearing a  Boss Challenge Room.

Name: Swallowed M80
Description: Isaac explodes upon taking damage.

Name: RC Remote
Description: Instead of trailing behind Isaac, familiars are directly controlled by the same inputs as Isaac's.

Name: Found Soul
Description: Spawns a familiar that copies Isaac's movements and scales with damage and tears. If it takes damage, it will die and respawn on the next floor.

Name: Expansion Pack
Description: Once per room, using an active item triggers another random active item effect.

Name: Beth's Essence
Description: Upon entering an Angel Room, spawns 5 wisp orbitals. Giving money to beggars can spawn wisps.

Name: The Twins
Description: Adds a chance to duplicate one of Isaac's familiars when entering a new room.

Name: Adoption Papers
Description: Shops can sell familiars, which will always be at a discounted price.

Name: Cricket Leg
Description: Adds a chance to spawn a random locust when killing an enemy.

Name: Apollyon's Best Friend
Description: Spawns an attack locust familiar which will fly forward while Isaac shoots.

Name: Broken Glasses
Description: Gives a 33% chance to add a '?' item to Treasure Rooms. Only one item can be taken. The extra items on the alt path are revealed instead.

Name: Ice Cube
Description: Adds a chance to petrify enemies when entering the room. Killing the petrified enemy freezes it.

Name: Sigil of Baphomet
Description: Grants an invulnerability shield for 1 second after killing an enemy.
